nodes.text: Kharrek was a male bounty hunter who operated during the time of the Galactic Empire. After Domina Tagge of the Tagge family put out a bounty on the rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra, Kharrek partnered with the sniper Just Lucky in order to capture her, utilizing darts laced with neurotoxin. After Kharrek and Lucky delivered Aphra to Tagge, the archaeologist incapacitated Kharrek with one of his own darts, stealing his blaster.
